description_for_human: Explains BNB Chain blockchain transactions in plain language. Understand transfers, swaps, staking, NFTs, and more.
description_for_model: Mull is a web application that explains BNB Chain blockchain transactions in human-readable language. It supports 30+ transaction types including transfers, swaps, staking, NFTs, DeFi lending, bridges, and smart contracts. Users can paste a transaction hash to get a clear breakdown of what happened, including sender/recipient addresses, amounts, gas fees, and token transfers. Supports both BNB Chain Mainnet and Testnet.
